channel.description: Recent content in China's on PepsFeeder

item.title: China's factories try to shield workers as output revives
item.description: BEIJING (AP) — To keep his 40 employees indoors and away from China’s virus outbreak, the manager of an electronics factory in Dongguan, near Hong Kong, says he hired a cook and arranged dormitories for them.
